author: Tyler Clifford
title: Calvin Klein-parent PVH CEO discloses COVID-19 diagnosis: 'I'm fine'
description: During a recent visit to a Bronx hospital, PVH CEO Manny Chirico said he was "shocked" to learn that he was positive for COVID-19.
content:
PVH CEO Manny Chirico on Wednesday told CNBC's Jim Cramer that he was recently diagnosed with COVID-19, the disease caused by the fast-spreading coronavirus.
"I'm fine, Jim," he said in a "Mad Money" interview.
Chirico, 62, learned that he was infected by t… [+1907 chars]
